mapper.select: select nvl(count(realpayment),0) newOrder, sum(realpayment) realpayment from (select ordernum from orderdetail where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid= #{userid})) a join ordertbl b on a.ordernum = b.ordernum where b.orderdate >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by realpayment

select orderstatus, count(orderstatus) ordercount from ( select ordernum, orderstatus from orderdetail where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid=#{userid})) a join ordertbl b on a.ordernum = b.ordernum where orderstatus not in('구매확정','결제완료') group by orderstatus

select nvl(sum(count(*)),0) reviewanswer from review where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid=#{userid})
and reviewanswer is null group by reviewanswer

select nvl(sum(count(*)),0) qanswer from userqboard where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid=#{userid})
and qanswer is null group by qanswer

select
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1),'yyyy-mm') monthData,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2),'yyyy-mm') monthData,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3),'yyyy-mm') monthData,
sum(orderprice*orderquantity) payData from orderdetail a join (select productnum from product where userid=#{param2}) b on a.productnum = b.productnum where orderconfirm between
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 0), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), -2), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and orderstatus = '구매확정' group by a.orderprice
